title: Last Girls
description: Demetra Brodsky's Last Girls is a twisting, suspenseful YA thriller about sisterhood, survival, and family secrets set in the world of doomsday prepping.No one knows how the world will end.On a secret compound in the Washington wilderness, Honey Juniper and her sisters are training to hunt, homestead, and protect their own.Prepare for every situation.But when danger strikes from within, putting her sisters at risk, training becomes real life, and only one thing is certain:Nowhere is safe.
author: Demetra Brodsky
